quad_real_text.text_second: Flexible space management platform for Facilities management
quad_real_text.text_third: Real-time occupancy layers to understand how teams utilize your spaces and meeting rooms
quad_real_text.text_fourth: Space booking platform for desks, meeting rooms, and common spaces
quad_real_text.text_fifth: Data and analytics dashboard with valuable insights

quad_real_space.heading: What is QuadReal Spaces?
quad_real_space.sub_heading: A custom tailored space management solution, providing our tenants with valuable insights and controls for their spaces.

card_text.para1: Easily navigate between each building and floor to reserve any desk or workstation that you need.
card_text.para2: Easily monitor which desks and meeting rooms become available in real time from you computer.

booking_demo.heading: Booking Demo
booking_demo.sub_heading: Follow along to discover how you can easily reserve your workspace
booking_demo.side_para: You can book your own workspace using this dashboard.
